{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3368553,"name":"","username":"cheesydoof","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T22:51:03.673Z","cooked":"

I just want to start this off by saying this : I mean no harm / aim to cause no controversy with this post :)) Just asking a question

FIRST is allll about GP, insiring others, and coopertition, and many many teams do fulfillthat! Its a very refreshing thing to see, and its one of the things I love most about FIRST.

As a software/programming kid, I‚Äôm always interesting in learning how my team can get better and how out code can be improved. I see great teams, moving so smoothly and fast across the field, and wonder how the heck they do that. However, to my surprise, some of these teams just outright don‚Äôt publish/share code. I‚Äôd love to be able to take a peek under the hood and figure out how to level up my team, and was just wondering what the motivation for not sharing is?

Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T22:51:03.673Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":129,"reads":2030,"readers_count":2029,"score":1281.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/frc-orbit-1690-2024-robot-cad-release/464838/36","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"FRC Orbit 1690 2024 Robot CAD Release","clicks":3},{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/frc-orbit-1690-2024-robot-cad-release/464838/44","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"FRC Orbit 1690 2024 Robot CAD Release","clicks":0},{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/2024-the-year-in-review/477837/3","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"2024: The Year in Review","clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":15}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64047,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_suspended":true,"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":15}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":15,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3368555,"name":"Rocky","username":"Rocky_S","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rocky_s/{size}/220194_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T22:52:22.264Z","cooked":"

Also for CAD!!!

OMG seeing the awsome robots doing absolutely magical things is insane! I would love more top teams to share their CAD as well.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T22:52:22.264Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":1944,"readers_count":1943,"score":523.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Rocky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":9}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":58611,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":9}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":9,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368558,"name":"Liam Fay","username":"Liam_Fay","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/liam_fay/{size}/221140_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T22:52:58.761Z","cooked":"

It can take a considerable amount of work to comment and format your code in a way that‚Äôs worth releasing. I think rather than worry about the teams who don‚Äôt share code, let‚Äôs celebrate how many teams of all experience levels do!

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T22:52:58.761Z","reply_count":4,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":1914,"readers_count":1913,"score":882.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Liam Fay","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":35}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25974,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"enthusiasm mentor - 3501"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/3","custom_user_title":"enthusiasm mentor - 3501","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":29},{"id":"-1","type":"emoji","count":18},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":6},{"id":"question","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":55,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368559,"name":"Itay Kaufman","username":"ItayKauf","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/itaykauf/{size}/264000_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T22:53:08.776Z","cooked":"

For some teams it‚Äôs just not in their nature to share with others, due to competitiveness and such. But I believe that if you ask a team privately for the code or for them to explain how did something, they would be more than happy to do it.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T22:53:17.662Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1883,"readers_count":1882,"score":541.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Itay Kaufman","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":10}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60124,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4590 GreenBlitz Team Captain "},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/4","custom_user_title":"4590 GreenBlitz Team Captain ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":10},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"cry","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":12,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368564,"name":"Dan Katzuv","username":"dan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/eada6e/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T22:55:32.004Z","cooked":"

Not sharing your code might also be a violation of R303.

FRC Rules Search

Rule R303

R303      *Create new designs and software, unless they‚Äôre public. ROBOT software and designs created before Kickoff are only permitted if the source files (complete information sufficient to produce the design) are available...

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T22:55:32.004Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1806,"readers_count":1805,"score":716.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Dan Katzuv","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frctools.com/2024/rule/R303","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"R303","clicks":99}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":30}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32004,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/5","custom_user_title":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":23},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"100","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":30,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368567,"name":"","username":"cheesydoof","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T22:56:59.749Z","cooked":"

I just feel like that nature is rather the opposite of what FIRST wants. FIRST is all about sharing. Regarding your second point about asking privately, I feel like its just even more shady to ask somebody for under the table code? Maybe that‚Äôs just me.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T22:56:59.749Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1700,"readers_count":1699,"score":380.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":60124,"username":"ItayKauf","name":"Itay Kaufman","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/itaykauf/{size}/264000_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64047,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_suspended":true,"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368574,"name":"Itay Kaufman","username":"ItayKauf","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/itaykauf/{size}/264000_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T22:59:56.254Z","cooked":"

Not all of the teams follow FIRST‚Äôs vision. A lot are much more competitive than others.

I do not know how is it like in other regions, but at least in Israel, I will be super comfortable to ask someone from another team about their system, or judged awards, and such, and in most cases they will be more than happy to share. At least that is my experience

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T22:59:56.254Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1656,"readers_count":1655,"score":371.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Itay Kaufman","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":64047,"username":"cheesydoof","name":"","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60124,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4590 GreenBlitz Team Captain "},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/7","custom_user_title":"4590 GreenBlitz Team Captain ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368585,"name":"Amit sucher","username":"AmitSucher","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/amitsucher/{size}/257401_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:07:27.089Z","cooked":"

While FIRST is about helping each other, there is nothing wrong with keeping stuff to yourself to have an advantage, since it is a sport overall.
And also let me assure you, that most teams that don‚Äôt share certain things publicly, will be more than happy to help you (you‚Äôd be surprised how many are willing to help and that they are geniuenly nice people)

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:07:27.089Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":1587,"readers_count":1586,"score":507.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Amit sucher","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":15}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55442,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Amit 6738"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/8","custom_user_title":"Amit 6738","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":12},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":15,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368589,"name":"","username":"cheesydoof","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:08:21.569Z","cooked":"

Sure even if you don‚Äôt follow their vision, to compete in their competition, you have to follow the rules. Not sharing your code is almost certainly a violation of R303

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:08:21.569Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1514,"readers_count":1513,"score":327.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":60124,"username":"ItayKauf","name":"Itay Kaufman","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/itaykauf/{size}/264000_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64047,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_suspended":true,"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"-1","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368590,"name":"Rocky","username":"Rocky_S","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rocky_s/{size}/220194_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:08:57.039Z","cooked":"

I think some top teams write completely new code each year, therefore they don‚Äôt have to public the code.

You HAVE to make it public only if you are going to reuse the code you wrote before.

Edit: Yo yo yo I posted this from orbits thread:

Orbit 1690 Presents: 2024 robot reveal - "Doppler"

re R303 - since we believe software is our competitive edge, there are some parts that we prefer not to publish, so before we finalize our robot CAD design, each year‚Äôs SW team members write a new clean robot code template to be used for that year.

1690 is an awsome team and really GP and really nice people on CD, and I totally respect their decision

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-22T00:07:09.133Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":1470,"readers_count":1469,"score":549.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Rocky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/orbit-1690-presents-2024-robot-reveal-doppler/455350/149","internal":true,"reflection":false,"title":"Orbit 1690 Presents: 2024 robot reveal - "Doppler"","clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":64047,"username":"cheesydoof","name":"","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":17}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":58611,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/10","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":16},{"id":"-1","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"thinking","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":23,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368596,"name":"Roman A.","username":"RomanTechPlus","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/romantechplus/{size}/214929_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:10:14.448Z","cooked":"

You dont need to format code for release, you CAN, but you dont have to. We do all of our development openly, so our codebase is public from day one, same is true for a good portion of our R&D projects too. The code doesnt have to look good, its about being a part of the FRC open source community.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:10:21.668Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":1388,"readers_count":1387,"score":382.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Roman A.","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":25974,"username":"Liam_Fay","name":"Liam Fay","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/liam_fay/{size}/221140_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":7}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53160,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5104 BreakerBots | Software and Additive Mfg. Lead"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/11","custom_user_title":"5104 BreakerBots | Software and Additive Mfg. Lead","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":7}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368600,"name":"Yishai Levy","username":"levyishai","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/levyishai/{size}/264719_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:14:00.856Z","cooked":"

Imo, sharing your code is the best and easiest act of Gracious Professionalism there is. Most teams are already using github, so it‚Äôs just one click (not to mention that it gives you more options like branch restrictions). Also, in most cases, when you want to ask for help, you‚Äôll be asked to show your code. It‚Äôs much easier if it were open source for everyone.

Not sharing the code can also be and most likely is a violation of the R303 rule. The rule dictates that if you use code from previous years, it must be public. Most if not all teams use code from previous years.

ItayKauf:

For some teams it‚Äôs just not in their nature to share with others, due to competitiveness and such.

I don‚Äôt like this competitiveness. Sharing and helping others is what FIRST is all about, so especially with the easiest act of kindness.

Liam_Fay:

It can take a considerable amount of work to comment and format your code in a way that‚Äôs worth releasing.

Even better! Sharing your code will make you want to create better code and improve it. Others might even point out some things that can improve your code.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:14:00.856Z","reply_count":4,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":2,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1331,"readers_count":1330,"score":456.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Yishai Levy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":11}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57809,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team Captain, Programming Lead & Operator"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/12","custom_user_title":"Team Captain, Programming Lead & Operator","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":8},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":11,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368606,"name":"Erik Boyle","username":"Ekcrbe","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ekcrbe/{size}/221615_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:17:56.169Z","cooked":"
levyishai:

Not sharing the code can also be and most likely is a violation of the R303 rule. The rule dictates that if you use code from previous years, it must be public. Most if not all teams use code from previous years.

This is a big claim. Several people have made the same statement in this thread. I‚Äôve yet to see any evidence.

I hope this doesn‚Äôt turn into the next iteration of the ‚Äúmentor built‚Äù cycle, where we play infinite whack-a-mole with people claiming that the top teams are actually doing something nefarious just because it‚Äôs an unfalsifiable accusation to lob at them.

","post_number":13,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:17:56.169Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":12,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1199,"readers_count":1198,"score":389.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Erik Boyle","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":7}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17480,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Somewhere between Thunderstruck and Country Roads"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/13","custom_user_title":"Somewhere between Thunderstruck and Country Roads","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":7}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368608,"name":"","username":"cheesydoof","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:18:28.449Z","cooked":"
levyishai:

Imo, sharing your code is the best and easiest act of Gracious Professionalism there is. Most teams are already using github, so it‚Äôs just one click

So i mean, generally teams don‚Äôt write the best code during the season and they most likely have to refactor it and make it look presentable. While easy, I do recognize that its not just one click

","post_number":14,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:18:28.449Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":12,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":1164,"readers_count":1163,"score":252.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64047,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_suspended":true,"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/14","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368612,"name":"","username":"cheesydoof","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:21:12.790Z","cooked":"
Ekcrbe:

he top teams are actually doing something nefarious

I dont see it as nefarious. I see it as attempting to keep your competitive edge by hiding and keeping knowledge for yourself, in a program designed to uplift everyone and in the end: teach and enrich highschoolers. By not publishing that code, regardless of if it breaks R303, you‚Äôre denying kids that knowledge, when that should be the last thing you do.

","post_number":15,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:21:12.790Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":13,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1128,"readers_count":1127,"score":330.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64047,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_suspended":true,"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/15","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":6}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368613,"name":"Itay Kaufman","username":"ItayKauf","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/itaykauf/{size}/264000_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:21:52.437Z","cooked":"
levyishai:

I don‚Äôt like this competitiveness. Sharing and helping others is what FIRST is all about, so especially with the easiest act of kindness.

I do not encourage it, I just presented it as it is‚Ä¶ Many teams are competitive and will not share their resources.

","post_number":16,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:21:52.437Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":12,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":1089,"readers_count":1088,"score":232.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Itay Kaufman","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60124,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4590 GreenBlitz Team Captain "},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/16","custom_user_title":"4590 GreenBlitz Team Captain ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"hugs","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368624,"name":"Yishai Levy","username":"levyishai","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/levyishai/{size}/264719_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:30:47.381Z","cooked":"
Ekcrbe:

I hope this doesn‚Äôt turn into the next iteration of the ‚Äúmentor built‚Äù cycle, where we play infinite whack-a-mole with people claiming that the top teams are actually doing something nefarious just because it‚Äôs an unfalsifiable accusation to lob at them.

I‚Äôm not claiming anyone did anything or going after anyone. I don‚Äôt belive anyone has malicious intent in not publishing code
Most people are just not aware of the rule, and it isn‚Äôt really enforceable.
Sharing your code should come from goodness.
Sure, maybe some teams do rewrite everything entirely. But it‚Äôs just not plausible that all the closed-source teams are rewriting everything each year.
It‚Äôs a decision between the team itself, whether to respect an unenforceable rule (not to mention all the other reasons to share code other than the rule).

cheesydoof:

and they most likely have to refactor it and make it look presentable.

You can even refactor the code after and while it‚Äôs public. Why does it matter?

","post_number":17,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:30:47.381Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":13,"quote_count":2,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":1092,"readers_count":1091,"score":233.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Yishai Levy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57809,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team Captain, Programming Lead & Operator"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/17","custom_user_title":"Team Captain, Programming Lead & Operator","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368625,"name":"Brendan Manning","username":"BrendanManning","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/67e7ee/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:30:47.479Z","cooked":"

What you‚Äôre describing is nefarious in more words. Describing something as directly against a program that most people see as good means those actions are bad. I disagree with your characterization of not sharing code, but your characterization does represent it as nefarious

","post_number":18,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:30:47.479Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":15,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":1035,"readers_count":1034,"score":222.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Brendan Manning","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":64047,"username":"cheesydoof","name":"","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e47774/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53971,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"NEU; 4761, 777 Alumni"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/18","custom_user_title":"NEU; 4761, 777 Alumni","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368628,"name":"Brendan Manning","username":"BrendanManning","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/67e7ee/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:33:33.077Z","cooked":"
levyishai:

Sure, maybe some teams do rewrite everything entirely. But it‚Äôs just not plausible that all the closed-source teams are rewriting everything each year.

If I had to guess the closed source teams that aren‚Äôt rewriting their code aren‚Äôt the ones anyone is worried about seeing code for. It‚Äôs much more likely they‚Äôre the team that hasn‚Äôt read the manual as closely as they should and is putting all of their effort into getting something ready for competition so when they need drive code they go and grab it from last year. Top teams are going to know the rules very well and they‚Äôll make sure that they don‚Äôt violate them.

","post_number":19,"post_type":1,"posts_count":145,"updated_at":"2024-04-21T23:33:33.077Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":17,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":1056,"readers_count":1055,"score":326.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":463832,"topic_slug":"why-do-some-teams-not-share-code","display_username":"Brendan Manning","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":7}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53971,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"NEU; 4761, 777 Alumni"},"post_url":"/t/why-do-some-teams-not-share-code/463832/19","custom_user_title":"NEU; 4761, 777 Alumni","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"-1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":8,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3368642,"name":"Vaughn Khouri","username":"CyberClone","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cyberclone/{size}/229178_2.png","created_at":"2024-04-21T23:40:43.618Z","cooked":"

As someone who‚Äôs been on a team that inherited almost all of its knowledge and competitive potential from the community, I can understand why it‚Äôs frustrating when teams don‚Äôt release CAD and code. Personally, I think all teams should do this as a baseline because it addresses the knowledge gap that is ever-present in FIRST. I believe we are making progress in this regard, and OA teams set an even higher gold standard of transparency that certainly helps to move the needle.

That being said, there are two clear reasons teams don‚Äôt:

  1. Competitive edge / risk of direct copying of CAD or Code

  2. The time and effort it takes to clean up CAD and Code to the point where it can be released and actually be useful

Both are definitely valid, and at the end of the day it‚Äôs up to the teams that write the code and do the design work. It‚Äôs especially understandable in situations involving specialized algorithms such as shoot-on-the-move code or specialized design work such as printed wheels that get more grip than other designs.
